snippet: A 1916 silent film starring William Gillette as the detective was found in the archive of the Cinémathèque française.
abstract: A 1916 silent film starring William Gillette as the detective was found in the archive of the Cinémathèque française.

headline.main: Early Sherlock Holmes Film Discovered in Paris
